tool_description: Es una API  que trae las paginas mas conocidas de climas de la Argentina. This is an API who give you the most popular climate pages of Argentina.
name: Clima Argentina
title: Clima Argentina

api_list.name: Get Specific Page of Climate from Argentina
api_list.description: Returns back the specific page of climate from Argentina by ID (this id dont be a number, it will be a name of the page like "lavoz" for example).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clima-argentina.p.rapidapi.com/clima/lavoz"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima-argentina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clima-argentina.p.rapidapi.com/clima/{climaid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clima-argentina.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climates News
api_list.description: Return back all the most popular pages of climate from Argentina.
